title: The Right Equation
description: Librarian Note: There is an Alternate Cover Edition for this edition of this book here (12 Jan. 2015).Penny and high school never got along. She attends her fifteen year reunion costume party on Halloween and hopes her high school crush Will shows up. When the lights go out and Will finds her, can their sparks turn the lights back on? This is a short story, approximately 8,600 words.
author: Tracy Krimmer
